attributes.action: Parents & students want compensation. Cancelled tuition due to lecturers strike
attributes.additional_details: Parents of university students and current university students are being unfairly affected both financial and academically by the pensions strike and without question not getting what they paid for. We demand for this to be debated in parliament and due compensation to be given to everyone affected.
attributes.background: The lecturers strike is unfair, students and parents are directly affected. Tuition was paid and lectures cancelled leaving students without any academic support. The university courses format will have to change to fit to the exact same format of the university degree the students applied for.
